mapper.insert: insert into samp ( samp_id, arriv_date, writer, price, pic, orgpic, coc_name, pdt_name, bigo,pdt_type) values (#{samp_id},#{arriv_date},#{writer},#{price},#{pic},#{orgpic},#{coc_name},#{pdt_name},#{bigo},#{pdt_type,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler, jdbcType=VARCHAR })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rn, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM samp ORDER BY ins_date DESC) A WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum}-1)* #{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE samp SET price = #{price}, arriv_date = #{arriv_date}, bigo = #{bigo}, upd_date = sysdate WHERE samp_id = #{samp_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from samp where ${condi} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
